body:
Comment 4: 
Agreed. The current description is a bit murky.

That said, it's not a mistake (at least grammatically), but the corresponding language
is missing. There's also a (intended) ambiguity: For instance, the expression x.f could
be both a QualifiedIdent or an Operand (using the identifier only form of the
QualifiedIdent) followed by a Selector. The former denotes an identifier in another
package, while the latter denotes a field of a struct. For the purpose of explaining the
grammar, the ambiguity is helpful (for the purpose of parsing, it is not - but this is
not the primary goal of this document).

Working on a proposal (CL).
